message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $13,000.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand the value it holds for you, however, I can't go below $13,700.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true worth of the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $13,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
